overview: Evil Angel's favorite female director, the legendary Belladonna, brings us seven scenes of interracial (and mostly anal) hardcore for those who like to see lovely young ladies - as the title says - "Serving the Black Man!" Most of these vignettes have an underlying theme of bosses abusing their power over the luscious young women in their employ, which gives the setups a perverse hint of dominance and submission. With a cast of delectable sluts like newcomer Charlotte Vale, voluptuous Chavon Taylor and sultry Dana DeArmond to pick from, you can't blame a brother for wanting to deliver the meat!
title: Dark Meat 3
